alert.note: Alert for Hartley; Oldham (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Oldham and southeastern Hartley Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Channing, or 26 miles north of Vega, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Channing and Adrian. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
